data.description:
Dive into the Retro-Futuristic World of Retronika!

Experience the ultimate fusion of high-speed racing and dynamic combat in Retronika. This story-driven single-player game lets you navigate vibrant cityscapes on your flying bike, facing thrilling challenges that push your skills to the limit.


Seamless Racing and Intense Shooting:

Control your bike with unique, intuitive handlebar mechanics for smooth 3D movement. Glide through the skies, dodge obstacles, and outmaneuver enemies with ease. Engage in dynamic battles against enemy drones and weaponized vehicles. Combine weapons for strategic combat and adapt to various scenarios, enhancing your gameplay experience.


Join the Community:

Become part of the Retronika community and share your experiences with fellow players. Compete on leaderboards, participate in events, and stay updated with the latest game developments. Dive into Retronika on Meta Quest and join a world filled with action and excitement. Get Retronika now and begin your adventure!
